definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Learn more about sangiovese wines in this free wine tasting video.
sentences.chinese: 桑嬌維塞葡萄酒更瞭解有關在此免費品酒視頻。

sentences.english: It is made from Sangiovese, which is the most well-known Italian autochthonal grape for excellence.
sentences.chinese: 此款由意大利著名優質葡萄品種桑嬌維塞釀製而成。

sentences.english: Sangiovese is a unique wine grape producing a type of red wine.
sentences.chinese: 桑嬌維塞是一個獨特的釀酒葡萄生產的紅葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Sangiovese grapes are amongst the top quality reds enjoyed for the classic wines they produce.
sentences.chinese: 桑嬌維塞堪稱上等的經典乾紅葡萄酒品種。
